hero.heading: Deploy Your Own Enterprise AI Assistant
hero.desc: Deploy a private, ChatGPT-like assistant that supports your own model, whether proprietary or open source, in both cloud and on-premises environments.

key_features.heading: Flexible, Integrated, and Secure AI Assistant

0.title: Bring your own model
0.text: Seamlessly link your models with any OpenAI-compatible API for flexible, versatile conversations. You can also customize the API endpoint to connect with platforms like LMStudio, GroqCloud, Mistral, OpenRouter and more.

1.title: Local RAG Integration
1.text: Use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to revolutionize your chat interactions.

2.title: Web Browsing Capability
2.text: This brings real-time web data straight into your conversations for richer, more informative interactions.

3.title: Granular Permissions and User Groups
3.text: Administrators can define detailed roles and access rights, creating a highly secure environment. This fine-grained control not only boosts security but also enables tailored user experiences that foster ownership and accountability.

0.title: Discovery Call
0.text: Collaborate with our team to define your unique requirements and objectives for a personalized solution.

1.title: Provision & Deploy
1.text: Deploy securely on-premises or in your cloud infrastructure.

2.title: Select and Configure LLM Models
2.text: Choose from high-performance, open-weight models based on your requirements.

3.title: Ingest Internal Knowledge Across Functions
3.text: Import documents from different departments — HR, design, operations, or communications. The assistant then becomes capable of answering cross-functional questions, such as: “What stage is the logo rebranding currently in?” or “What’s our policy for remote volunteer onboarding?”

4.title: Monitor and Iterate
4.text: Launch organization-wide, monitor usage, gather feedback, and continuously update internal knowledge for improved accuracy and relevance.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: All the details you need to confidently plan, deploy, and scale your enterprise AI assistant.
faq.0_answer: Infrastructure provisioning, core stack install (frontend/backend/proxy), key integrations (Ollama/OpenAI, RAG, web‐fetch, SCIM, RBAC, i18n, image gen), security hardening, testing, documentation and handoff.
faq.1_answer:
• Ollama & any OpenAI-compatible endpoint (LMStudio, GroqCloud, Mistral, OpenRouter, etc.)
  • Local RAG, OneDrive, and Google Drive
  • SCIM 2.0 (Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace)
  • Image-generation backends (AUTOMATIC1111, ComfyUI, DALL·E)
faq.2_answer: Typically 1–3 weeks, depending on infrastructure readiness, number of integrations, customization and compliance requirements.
faq.3_answer:
• Cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • On-premises (bare-metal or private cloud)
  • Hybrid (mix of on-prem and public cloud)
faq.4_answer:
We offer a flexible model:
  • One-time setup fee
  • Pay-as-you-go (based on compute usage)
  • Optional support & maintenance
  • No hidden fees, no lock-in
